a:r.a:t: We applied four primary methodologies to form our preliminary view of HKA’s valuation
Analysis of valuation multiples for publicly traded comparable companies
Proprietary knowledge based on Lincoln’s experience in the space
Limited number of M&A transactions for which terms were disclosed
Reflects net present value of future cash flows and performance
Highly sensitive to discount rate assumptions
Multiple of LTM June 2018P Adjusted EBITDA of $28.2 mm
HKA will achieve a valuation of 8.5x
Multiple of 2017 Adjusted Run-rate EBITDA of $31.4 mm
Represents October 2017 90 day run-rate revenue ($272.8 mm) multiplied by 2018P Adjusted Consolidated EBITDA margin (11.4%)
